title: How to do Pythagorean theorem word problems - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello Ashwin If I understand the question correctly, Pythagorean theorem word problems are simply the problem described in words without any accompanying diagrams. You need to decipher the problem and create the necessary diagrams if you need to. In the attached website there is a worked example of this : https://www.khanacademy.org/math/cc-eighth-grade-math/cc-8th-geometry/pythagorean-theorem-application/e/pythagorean-theorem-word-problems--basic
